record.text:
@thebluewizard.bsky.social  The ritual has been completed, I have been summoned from my slumber on the eternal plane.  Why Have you summoned me!!! I slept so soundly... Make your request and bid me go!  

I smell @iamkettle.bsky.social‬ ...

I know not what you are, or where the small, gross beatle-bug found you after I whisperer my call for help to them, but... 

Thank for answering! The situation is dire!

Follow your nose!

I thank thee, little gross beatle - you have obviously succeeded in delivering my open call for help. 

We had such little hope.

And you found someone so.... specific.

value.text:
@thebluewizard.bsky.social  The ritual has been completed, I have been summoned from my slumber on the eternal plane.  Why Have you summoned me!!! I slept so soundly... Make your request and bid me go!  

I smell @iamkettle.bsky.social‬ ...

record.text: bu/g frie1$d ?
People don't realize how easy it is to stab a kettle, they think it can't be that easy, if it was, everyone would do it.

I stabbed one, it always worked but their flesh, so hard now.  Thousands of years I slept and slept and slept and they evolved!  

#kettleocalypse
Ok, I am watching @ventreal.bsky.social take on the kettles outside The Big Tree!

value.text:
I stabbed one, it always worked but their flesh, so hard now.  Thousands of years I slept and slept and slept and they evolved!  

#kettleocalypse

record.text:
... the kettles don't seem to understand the idea of taking 'breaks' between 'Rounds' and while she rests they are just pummeling her and pouring boiling water on her.... 

This has not gone as well as we'd hoped 😕
I just don't understand why @ventreal.bsky.social would have thought these kettles were _soft_ ... like that makes no sense 😕 🙄

Aww I know Ventreal will win! Sometimes you just have a feeling!

I just threw down a vial of some very Blessed mandrake essential oils!

It looks like they landed within reach. Thank you Blessed Big Tree! 

🥰🥰🥰

Ventreal has taken some serious damage and she generally seems quite surprised the kettles are made of metal.

She has retreated to her 'corner', asking for a little break... and, well this is hard to watch...
You can do it, @ventreal.bsky.social ! You can do anything! 🫶

I guess you could call this Round 1!

Things are looking quite unevenly matched.

Honestly we are optimistic but thought @ventreal.bsky.social would be much more adept at dealing with these kettles!

We see you from our fun little perch up here on this fun little branch! 

Sending you warm beams of love! You got this! 🥰

The burns are so deep I can not feel the pain.  Where I have fallen; take up my dagger... plunge it into the heart of  @iamkettle.bsky.social 

Avenge me my team Ethanual, Great Giant, Clortia
Avenge me young @mervastra.bsky.social  This day will be my last but I will live eternal in your memories.

I'm sad to say, our mysterious hero has fallen.

we thought she was getting up for a moment ... but she only reached over to the vial of essential oils tossed down to her by @rootabegga.bsky.social 
which was probably a merciful way to go at that point.

I'm so confused. she was so specialized 🤷‍♂️
..

value.text:

record.text:
🥰 we will not forget her! 🥰

I'm going to write a poem about her. Or a recipe! 

Thank you, Big Tree, Mother Arulioanthular!

💓💓
Ugh
Why are you talking to that goof she’s my apprentice
The stones are silent.

🚨UPDATE: “As I hid inside a big ceramic pot I witnessed a young(?) woman with a strange gait approaching the village drawbridge. She pulled the lever, admitting into town several Druids and a massive army of grizzlies. Could this be our salvation? Updates as they happen.” -Ax

🚨UPDATE: “It’s all come to this. The grizzlies have reached the village, and the kettles appear ready to hold their ground. Days of kettle terror, and now the battle for our lives begins. No turning back.” -Ax

#ontheground #kettleocalypse

🚨 UPDATE: “Folks, you heard it here first — we’re gonna be just fine. Wowie those bears are mean!!!”

#ontheground #kettleocalypse

🚨FINAL UPDATE: 

As the evening draws to a close with a Druid victory firmly in hand, I’m reminded of something the legendary Althea Forthwind once told me as we ran for our lives from a herd of ice trolls in Tjórmskåle. “Axie,” she said (she called me Axie), “Axie, 

1/2

if the big finale of your story is making it out alive, you’re doing it right kid.” I gotta say folks, we did it right today didn’t we?

I’ll be back with the full story of The Kettleocalypse in the near future, you can count on that. But for now this is Ax Moorman, signing off 🪓 🫡

2/2

Yesterday while soaking in an obsidian milk hole I received word from a raven that our great village was in grave danger due to the reckless (treasonous?) actions of @thebluewizard.bsky.social 

I rushed home and was greeted by an unthinkable sight: my beautiful village in shambles

1/5

Homes destroyed. Blood and melted goo everywhere. Huge mounds of brown fur clogging the gutters!

The scale of devastation is truly staggering

Luckily my home was fine because I wouldn't be caught dead with one of those abominations in my possession

2/5

We are all so so lucky that my incredibly talented apprentice @abigailgrunewald.bsky.social (who has clearly absorbed many lessons via my rigorous mentorship) was around to save the day while others were taking their little naps in The Big Tree!

3/5

So, given the severity of calamity brought on by a member of our own Council, I have no choice but to strip @thebluewizard.bsky.social of his Council seat effective immediately

Further, he stands accused by the Council of treason and also murder and property damage

4/5

Additionally I am taking the unprecedented step of appointing an Apprentice to the Council for the first time in history 

@abigailgrunewald.bsky.social will hereby occupy the seat formerly held by The Blue Wizard. She has earned every bit of this honour

That is all, may Galathilion forgive us

5/5

I was never even on the stupid council. 

Not surprised you wouldn't know that.

Have you even showed up to a single council meeting since becoming HoC?

Yes you were we have all your absentee ballots to prove it

Anyway why are we fighting? According to your absentee ballots we agree on basically every issue
